description.value:
The target grows a prehensile tail, or gains prehensile qualities in their existing tail, to help them climb with ease. For the duration of the spell, they gain a climb Speed equal to their highest Speed. The target can Climb with a hand occupied (or two hands occupied if they have the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Combat Climber] feat).

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Spell Effect: Canopy Crawler]

Heightened (5th) The spell's duration increases to 1 hour, and you can target both yourself and your animal companion with a single casting.
